title: Delicious Eggless Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '160g flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '130g caster sugar', '150 ml milk (or soyamilk)', '60g melted butter (or margarine)', '1-2 tablespoons cocoa', 'For the icing', '300g icing sugar', '1 1/2 tablespoons cocoa', '2 teapoons vanilla sugar (optional)', '100g butter (or margarine)', '3 tablespoons coffee']
